nodes.bodyText: I might be wrong but this may lead to circular dependencies
Sure thing it could, but the build looks ok? Won't usage of setter hide circular dependency if we have any?

previously it also looked good before that failed first time, I mean that this thing does not reproduce stably
didn't get your second question :)

Let me rephrase :)
We should not workaround circular deps in most of the cases, they should be broken. So I would like to be aware if we got one here :)
